headline: Mizuho’s Katz sees 'fertile' conditions driving robust M&A market into 2026
summary: The "fertile" conditions driving dealmaking in 2025 will persist through the end of the year and ​into the next as CEOs look for scale and private-equity firms ‌offload aging assets, according to Michal Katz, Mizuho Americas head of investment and corporate banking.
